import React from "react"; import Header from './Header' import Footer from './Footer' import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import data from "../data.json" const selectedMaterial = window.location.pathname.split('/')[2] function Material() { let { material } = useParams() return (

MATERIAIS
SOLDADOS

Aço Carbono Alumínio Inox Cobre Ferro Fundido

{material}

{/*
    */}
    {data.materials[material]}
    {/*
*/}
); } export default Material;
